expressions-desc: The description of the extension as shown on Special:Version.
expressions-unidentified-token-message: Error message shown to the user when they entered an unknown token.
expressions-unidentified-token-submessag: Error submessage shown to the user when they entered an unknown token.
expressions-unidentified-token-hint: Hint message shown to the user when they entered an unknown token.
expressions-invalid-type-message: Error message shown to the user when the evaluator came across a type it did not expect.
expressions-invalid-type-submessage: Error submessage shown to the user when the evaluator came across a type it did not expect.
expressions-invalid-type-hint: Hint message shown to the user when the evaluator came across a type it did not expect.
expressions-binary-left-type-exception: Reason shown to the user why a type error occurred when it occurred on a binary operator on its left side.
expressions-binary-right-type-exception: Reason shown to the user why a type error occurred when it occurred on a binary operator on its right side.
expressions-unary-type-exception: Reason shown to the user why a type error occurred when it occurred on a unary operator.
expressions-unclosed-paren-message: Error message shown to the user when there is an unclosed parentheses.
expressions-unclosed-paren-hint: Hint message shown to the user when there is an unclosed parentheses.
expressions-unexpected-token-message: Error message shown to the user when the parser came across a token it did not expect.
expressions-unexpected-token-submessage: Error submessage shown to the user when the parser came across a token it did not expect.
expressions-unexpected-token-value-hint: Hint shown after an unexpected token exception when a value was expected.
expressions-unexpected-token-operator-hi: Hint shown after an unexpected token exception when an operator was expected.
expressions-unexpected-token-rightparen-: Hint shown after an unexpected token exception when a value was expected, but a right parenthesis was given.
expressions-expected-operator-after: Message shown in the 'unexpected-token-exception' when a value followed by an operator was expected.
expressions-expected-operator-before: Message shown in the 'unexpected-token-exception' when a value preceded by an operator was expected.
expressions-expected-value-after: Message shown in the 'unexpected-token-exception' when an operator followed by a value was expected.
expressions-expected-value-before: Message shown in the 'unexpected-token-exception' when an operator preceded by a value was expected.
expressions-expected-value: Message shown in the 'unexpected-token-exception' when a value was expected.
